Package net.proteusframework.users.capability

User capability API.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DataOperation
    Interface for enums which represent Data Capabilities.
    EntityOperation
    Interface for Capability Operations on hibernate entities
    PrincipalGrantableCapability
    Interface specifying that an AbstractCapability sub-type can be granted directly to a Principal
    PrincipalGroupGrantableCapability
    Interface specifying that an AbstractCapability sub-type can be granted to Principals via a PrincipalGroup
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCapability
    Abstract class for defining capabilities
    AbstractDataCapability
    Abstract class for defining a data capability.
    AbstractEntityCapability<T>
    Abstract class for defining a data capability whose subject is an entity.
    CapabilityDAO
    DAO for Capabilities
    DataFunction
    Data that may be capability controlled.
    EntityFunction
    Entity data that may be capability controlled.
    Function
    An action that may be capability controlled.
    FunctionCapability
    The granter or revoker of a Function

Package net.proteusframework.users.capability Description

User capability API. Similar in function to permissions.
